short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ninja Knife is an endless score attack arcade game where you have to survive for as long as possible on top of a tower

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ninjaâ€™s from an opposing clan will attack you relentlessly until you are defeated.

INTRODUCTION
Play Ninja Knife on your Google Chrome Browser with our simple & lightweight extension - No Internet required, no ADS, and 100% Free!

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Ninja Knife extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Ninja Knife  icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Ninja Knife popup will open. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

HOW TO PLAY?
Throw the knives into the enemies by clicking to break them
